comments.comment: Man meka sathya kathawak kiyala pigannewa man mewa mage ass dekata dakala thiyanewa campus yanne ahinsaka kello aliyata anne badu wela. Mun raata paduru asse hukanewa lajja nhhh saththu wage hasirenne campus yane kello badinne kalin siya dhahas warayak hithanne vaidhya parikshane karala unath balanne. Ahh kello kollo 4 5hk akka hukala thamai badu wela campus walin aliyata anne. Katahari vishwasa naththam mata puluwan oppu karanne. Ahinsaka  ganu lamaige jiivithe kunu karanne hadanne ai mee sakkili mewata raje wagakiyanne one nithiya thadha karanam mewa wenna. Ahinsaka kello campus awata passe nawaka wada kiyala aaa kellawa dushane karanewa aka thamai aththa. Oya athal ganne thamai campus wala auruduu 8,9feel wewi campus akeme lagala inne asahana karayo.
